text: 9.33: Sng 118.22; Ais 8.14; 28.16; Mt 21.42; Ro 10.11; 1 Pi 2.6-8Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar, khaŋ muuŋgi kameŋ ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ nzuai, “Nde mbarara! Gu gumgi ŋkari ga sɨrim, mbe rɨrga kɨma ndim Saionan ndararga. Ana mba gumgi ŋkari ga sɨrim, mbe rɨrga. Mba ana khothɨgi guma, ana mberɨrga fhu.”
